Localization.Name: Roberts Space Industries
Localization.Description: The original creators of the engine that kickstarted Humanity’s expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries builds a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs, from basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. The tagline is “Roberts Space Industries: Delivering the Stars since 2075”

English.Name: Roberts Space Industries
English.Description: The original creators of the engine that kickstarted Humanity’s expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries builds a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs, from basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. Localization.Name: RSI Polaris Remote Turret Missile Rack
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: RSI
Size: 4
Missiles: 12xS2 

A bespoke remote turret for the Polaris outfitted with a S4 mount holding a missile rack equipped with twelve S2 missiles.
